name: All Good People Here
author: Ashley Flowers
title: You can’t ever know for sure what happens behind closed doors

name: Local Woman Missing
author: Marry Kubica
title: Dark and twisty, with white-knuckle tension and jaw-dropping surprises—Riley Sager, New York Times bestselling author of Home Before Dark

name: Then She Was Gone
author: Lisa Jewell
title: From the New York Times bestselling author of Invisible Girl and None of This Is True comes a “riveting” (PopSugar) and “acutely observed family drama” (People) that delves into the lingering aftermath of a young girl’s disappearance.

name: The Housemaid
author: Freida
title: Every day I clean the Winchesters’ beautiful house top to bottom.

name: One Day in December
author: Ashley Flowers
title: Two people. Ten chances. One unforgettable love story

name: The Seven Year Slip
author: Ashley Flowers
title: new novel from the New York Times bestselling author of The Dead Romantics.
